data.title: Sinclair Automotive - Australia
data.meta_description:
Sinclair Automotive - Australia | 108 followers on LinkedIn. Sinclair Ford was first established in November 1969 by Ross Sinclair who then sold the business in September 2000. The company has always prided itself on employing local people where possible and with a huge focus on customer service both before and after the sale.

The company cause is “To give our customers the best possible experience”.
data.text:
Sinclair Ford was first established in November 1969 by Ross Sinclair who then sold the business in September 2000. The company has always prided itself on employing local people where possible and with a huge focus on customer service both before and after the sale. The company cause is “To give our customers the best possible experience”. The business started as a stand alone Ford dealership and has then progressed to be a multi franchise dealership, with Isuzu Ute and LDV and now Peugeot added to the stable. The staff at Sinclair Ford are all highly trained and are experts in their respective fields – be it the car dealership showroom, our dedicated Ford workshop or our finance and sales team. If you’re looking for the most experienced and trained award winning staff to help you through the car buying process, visit the Sydney Ford dealership at Sinclair Ford and buy the best car for your needs. http://www.sinclairford.com.au/ http://www.sinclairisuzuute.com.au/ http://www.sinclairldv.com.au/ http://www.sinclairpeugeot.com.au/

Website

http://www.sinclairautomotive.com.au
